record.creatorPhotographer: Martyn, Edward W.; Martyn's Maroon Studio
record.description: University of Chicago Track Team, 1904. Fifth row: Edwin Eugene Parry, Robert Llewellyn Henry, Robert Wallace Maxwell, Stirling Bruce Parkinson, and John Frederick Tobin; fourth row: Sanford Avery Lyon, Frederick Adolph Speik, and Hugo Morris Friend; third row: Mark Seavey Catlin, Burton Pike Gale, and Victor Sidney Rice; second row: Arthur W. Clark, Clyde Amel Blair (captain), Edward Reed Ferriss, and Amos Alonzo Stagg (coach); first row: Mortimer Llewellyn Cahill, Thomas Barnett Taylor, Charles Ferguson Kennedy, and William Gorham Matthews.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
